column4: i need to change my resolution from a standard to a widescreen. ubuntu has correctly identified and as far as i know installed the correct driver for my chipset, but i do not have the option of selecting a widescreen monitor. im using the Intel 945GM express chipset, anybody have any ideas?

add the correct modeline to your xorg.conf?
